title: Zettelkasten Inbox
description: This flow is used to create notes following the Zettelkasten system. It helps you to create a new note and classify it into one of the categories: Idea Note, Pill of Knowledge, Meeting Note, or Draft of a Design. It also allows you to add tags to the notes.
author: RafaelGB

nodes.zettelflowConfig: {"root":true,"actions":[{"type":"script","hasUI":false,"id":"881de9f0-b008-4d13-90dd-07ffdd945df0","description":"Add Daily Link","code":"const today = `[[${moment().format('YYYY-MM-DD')}]]`;\ncontent.addFrontMatter({dailyLink: today});"}],"label":"new inbox input","childrenHeader":"","targetFolder":"0. üßµ Inbox","optional":false}
nodes.label: Inbox
